Blog.post: 100 things part uno. 1. I was born in Fairfax Virginia. 2. I am a urlLink Leo . GRRRR 3. My name means BEAUTIFUL in Yiddish. 4. I was born in the year of the Sheep; we are charming, elegant and artistic, & like material comforts..hmm who knew :) 5. I am the youngest of 4 girls. 6. I was a spoiled child. 7. I am an auntie to 3 nieces. Antie loves ya, Giselle, Jasmine & Briana! 8. I'm currently in college. 9. My major is Advertising. 10. I wanted to join the peace corp, but my family talked me out of it. 11. I work with numbers. 12. I am an awful writer. 13. I am a crafty b*tch. 14. My favorite number is 6, always has. Don't ask me why. 15. I'm a cheesecake addict. mmmm...turtle cheesecake. 16. I luuuurve reading. 17. My first real * car was a 1990 750il. *real as in something that I wanted, not needed. 18. Still driving it. woo hoo. 19. I really hate driving especially in Arizona, ya'll people is craaazy. 20. I collect 'The Jungle Book' stuff and Orange Blossom dolls 21. I love sewing 22. I don't smoke. 23. Someday I'd love to help build a home with Habitat of Humanity. 24. I love shopping. 25. I cry easily. 26. I'm a girlie girl. 27. I love cuddling. 28. I love watching movies. 29. I'm terrible at replying to e-mails. 30. I, however, love getting e-mail. 31. I love taking hot showers and bubble baths 32. I love chatting on AIM. 33. I love my computer 34. I spend way to much time on it. 35. I love to dance…. Baile! 36. My favorite TV show is CSI 37. and coming in second is...anything on the history channel. 38. I admire people that aren't afraid to be who they are. 39. My favorite flower is the Lotus or Lily. 40. I procrastinate waaaaay to much. 41. I have yet to have my heart broken. 42. My favorite season is summer. 43. I think jealousy is a very ugly virtue. 44. I was raised Episcopalian & went to church every Sunday...not anymore. 45. I am NOT a night owl OR an early bird. 46. My father passed away in 2003. 47. I worry to much about what others thing of me. 48. I worry too much about others & not my self. 49. I love my family sooo much. 50. I am a too trusting person. Next 50 things...coming soon.

HOW EVIL ARE YOU? I am 27% evil. I try to stay away from evil deeds but succumb to temptation every once in a while. I'm not quite on my way to hell but I certainly have some explaining to do. Are you evil? find out at Hilowitz.com

1. Grab the book nearest to you, turn to page 18, find line 4. --Not so much a book...a manual, line 4 Wire transfer info. 2. Stretch your left arm out as far as you can. What do you touch first? --My Kate Spade bag 3. What is the last thing you watched on TV? -- urlLink News Channel 3 morning news...Brad the Weather Guy. 4. WITHOUT LOOKING, can you guess what the time is? --12:00 5. Now look at the clock, what is the actual time? --12:09, I was close, I know it's lunch time ... my stomach was grumbling. 6. With the exception of the computer, what can you hear? --The phone ringing, lotsa typing...yes I am at work. 7. When did you last step outside? What were you doing? --Around 7:30am, to carry my bottom to work. 8. Before you came to this website, what did you look at? -- urlLink JCREW 9. What are you wearing? --Red slacks, sleveless black shirt w/white collar, black sandals... very simple. 10. Did you dream last night? --Don`t remember. 11. When did you last laugh? --A while ago, talking about AZ drivers. 12. What is on the walls of the room you are in? --Nothing on the walls, I have a calender in my cubicle, a few cheat sheets for work. 13. Seen anything weird lately? --Nope. 14. What do you think of this quiz? --cute 15. What is the last film you saw? --Kill Bill 16. If you became a multi-millionaire overnight, what would you buy first? --Floss, cause Im out. 17. Can you tell something about you that no one knows? --I hate brushing my teeth, too. I have sensitive teeth. 18. If you could change one thing about the world, regardless of guilt or politics, what would you do? --Remove prejudice, I know corny but it's a very touchy subject for me. 19. Do you like to dance? --Of Course... Baile ! 20. George Bush: is he a power-crazy nut case or some one who is finally doing something that has needed to be done for years? --Nutcase. 21. Imagine your first child is a girl, what do you call her? --What`s with the difficult questions. Lil ol indicisive me, I have a list.. Isabella Eva Padma, or Priya. I really like this one. 22. Imagine your first child is a boy, what do you call him? --Another list Victor, after my dad. Ethan, or Raab. 23. Would you ever consider living abroad? Hell yeah .. England, Brazil, Hawaii, Germany, Spain, Australia.

In celebration of my big two five we all went to urlLink Zen 32 yesterday evening. We enjoyed; California Rolls Crab & Avacado Shrimp Rolls Spicy Shrimp Rolls Shrimp Tempura Asparagus / Fresh Salmon / Crab rolls Baby Octopus Two bottles of sake And a birthday cake. I'll post pictures soon.

Back from Las Vegas.....I had an excellent time. Lots of......fun...walking....eating....drinking... We drove to Vegas, only about a 4 hour trip. We drove up through the Hoover Dam...beautiful. We stayed at the urlLink Imperial Palace , which is an OK Hotel, It was mid strip in the middle of everything & the urlLink tram stopped at our hotel so we were pretty in the mix of things. We visited most of the casinos. Ate a lot, we did the buffet thing while in Vegas. urlLink Sam's Firelight buffet did we enjoy. I had an excellent time in Vegas. July 28th Today is MY Birthday...! Happy birthday to me...and all the other Leo's out there.
Only 1 more day till my Birthday Vegas Trip.....Soooo excited. Anywhoooo. I purchased the HP urlLink Photosmart 435xi from Insight.com. Very Inexpensive.

Happy Monday! Back at work... & for some odd reason lovin it. Did I miss work this weekend? My weekend consisted of Level 2 Bingo @ Gila River Casino. This was my first Bingo experience. For $27 I played all night long. For about 3.5 hours. Didn't win... Not this time anyways, However it was quite amusing. First we were the youngest crowd in the bingo hall. I am sure people were wondering why 25 years olds were playing bingo on a Friday night.... Then there are these most adorable little.. itty bitty old ladies with their gazillion bingo cards (I don't know how they do it, I had trouble keeping up with my 3) & their trinkets...I mean loads of trinkets & dotters. I enjoyed my self. That night. Saturday we looked for a good digital camera for my birthday. I want an inexpensive, compact, & good quality camera. I am leaning toward a urlLink PhotoSmart 735xi , just cause that's all I own, HP. I'm still looking though. Sunday...Ahh Sunday. Shopping...just a few items. Then lunch @ Rainforest Cafe. We had the Awesome Appetizer Adventure; Chimi Cha-Cha's, Blue crab delight, Crispy Caribe tenders & Coastal Calamari. All was good. A mildy uneventful weekend, but fun nonetheless.
urlLink I love this dress soo much, I had to buy it...You like? urlLink
Fried Eggplant ( & Zuchini) with Yogurt Sauce...mmmmm.. The best!
